change.text: Added a new overload of StreamUtils.readStreamLines
Added class DefaultExecutorServiceFactory as a simple default implementation of the IExecutorServiceFactory
Renamed I(Non)ThrowingCallback to I(Non)ThrowingRunnableWithParameter for consistent naming. The method name was also changed from execute to run
Added IThrowingCallable and IThrowingCallableWithParameter interface so that the hierarchy is complete
INonThrowingRunnable is now derived from IThrowingRunnable
Added method clear and interface IClearable to class InMemoryLogger
Removed final modifier from class InMemoryLogger
Added XMLHelper getNamespaceURI method, to retrieve the namespace URI of an arbitrary node
Extracted MicroTypeConverter from MicroTypeConverterRegistry to have the same naming as the regular type converter
Changed the ITypeConverterRegistrarSPI SPI interface to take a callback interface for easier integration
Changed the IMicroTypeConverterRegistrarSPI SPI interface to take a callback interface for easier integration
Extracted classes StringMicroTypeConverter and StringBasedMicroTypeConverter and made them publically available
Added the new changelog category 'test' for all test related issues
Added the abstract base class AbstractChildrenProviderWithUniqueIDHasChildren
NonBlockingMessageDigestGenerator got the static API getDigestFromInputStream to create a message digest from an InputStream
Added some constants in CXML
Added CompareUtils.safeEquals (BigDecimal, BigDecimal) to correctly handle comparison of BigDecimal values with different scales
Added HashingOutputStream
HashingInputStream uses now a NonBlockingMessageDigestGenerator
Extended the RegExPool and RegExHelper classes to also support options for pattern compilation (e.g. MULTILINE, DOTALL etc.)
Added new methods to FilenameHelper: getExtension(File) and hasExtension(File)
Added several new constructors to the IMulti*Map* implementations
@ShouldBeDeprecated is now also allowed for fields
Added new class MicroTypeConverterTreeXML for converting trees to XML using the default MicroTypeConverterRegistry types
Improved API of TreeXMLConverter so that it can easily read from IMicroElement instead of IMicroDocument
Moved implementations of Graph objects into a separate package
Removed TreeWalkerWithID and TreeWalkerDynamicWithID as they can be replaced with TreeWalker and TreeWalkerDynamic
Removed final from most Comparator implementations
Added new classes ComparatorComparable and ComparatorHasIDComparable
Tree class hierarchy heavily changed so that all packages have the same naming for the same semantics
FolderTree* implementations now automatically use the keyCombinator method from the FolderTreeFactory
Made the keyCombinator of the FolderTree stuff optional. In that case the regular ID is returned instead of the concatenated ID
FileSystemFolderTree is now derived from DefaultFolderTree
Renamed "FolderTree*" implementations to "DefaultFolderTree*" and introduced abstract base implementations
Started making FolderTree more usable by being more flexible
Added IMicroElement.setAttribute(String,long) as a sanity method
GraphIterator now supports filtering relations to identify which relations to follow in iteration and which not
Introduced IGraphNode and IGraphRelation interfaces and using them
Class SimpleGraph is no longer final
Added blank before self-closing tags in XML writing
EnumTextResolverWithPropertiesOverrideAndFallback uses fallbacks for override and fallback determination
The list returned from LocaleUtils.getCalculatedLocaleListForResolving is now unmodifiable
Added SimpleFileIO.writeFile with a list of lines
Fixed error in tree with unique ID, so that "getItemWithID" calls failed afterwards, because the item was removed from the factory and not added again
Extended EnumHelper API to support case insensitive String lookup
Changelog entries now support the 'incompatible' attribute of type boolean
Changed Generics type names to be more 'speaking' (e.g. ELEMENTTYPE instead of T)
Extracted anonymous inner classes of ContainerHelper into named public classes
Added class AggregatorConstant
Moved class to ChildrenProviderElementWithName to package com.phloc.commons.microdom.utils
Added insertAtIndex method to IMicroNode
Added IHasDisplayTextWithArgs interface
Added MicroDOMInputStreamProvider constructor using the default charset
Added new class ComparatorHasIDString, ComparatorHasSimpleIntID and ComparatorHasSimpleLongID
Added new class CDefault having constant default values for primitive and primitive wrapper types
Added all default type conversions from and to AtomicBoolean
Removed all @Deprecated methods
Moved everything in package dyntypes and beans to separate project phloc-types
Added a static create method for class FactoryConstantValue
Added a static getAsString method to AbstractReadonlyAttributeContainer for converting a parameter Object to a String
Added a non-blocking MessageDigestGenerator as well as an IMessageDigestGenerator interface
Added a callback when reading change logs for advanced handling of the error messages.
Added automatic splitting of CDATA sections that contain the illegal ]]> elements
Changed default XML encoding of ' to ' because IE8 emits an error otherwise
Added possibility to clear ImageDataManager cache
Changed some methods to start with "getAs" instead of "as"
Fixed bug in FilenameHelper makeValidFilename in case a forbidden character was contained more than once
Added StringHelper API startsWithAny and endsWithAny
Added FilenameHelper API getAbsoluteWithEnsuredParentDirectory and getRelativeToParentDirectory
Automatic masking of XML character ' to '
Each change log entry now knows its parent changelog.
Added XML serialization option to ignore comments
Added IHasErrorLevel interface
Removed final from ResourceError class
Added another ResourceLocation constructor
Resource error API improved with error/noError API
Trying to unify resource error group handling
Added class XMLSchemaValidationHelper for easy XML schema validation
Added missing type converters for AtomicInteger, AtomicLong, StringBuffer and StringBuilder
Fixed NPE in JAXB validation event handler
Fixed error in emitting XML nodes with multiple different namespaces
Added default micro type converters for basic types and the enumeration types in the state package
Added default type converters for the enumeration types in the state package
Changed the way how type converters are registered. Therefore the exact type converter can be used more often which results in better performance
MicroTypeConverterRegistry now explicitly throws TypeConverterException in case no converter was found or conversion failed
Added class HasDisplayTextWithArgs
Added createDirIfNotExisting and createDirRecursiveIfNotExisting to file operations
Added interface ISeverityComparable for EErrorLevel
Ignoring comments in DTDs when reading MicroDOM XML
Extended MathHelper API adding longToInt
Fixed heuristic in MicroReader determining ignorable whitespaces
Added a new changelog action 'update' for the update of external components
Added a new changelog category 'security' for all security relevant issues
Added StringHelper.multiContains to check if a set of chars is contained in another set of chars
The DynamicValue API now uses the TypeConverter more consistent and therefore also throws TypeConverterExceptions
Made some more APIs Serializable
Extended ContainerHelper API to support newUnmodifiableMap and newUnmodifiableOrderedMap
Extended MicroReader API with a method to handle String+EntityResolver
Extended ContainerHelper API to support getFirstElement, getFirstKey and getFirstValue on Maps
Added support for reading, modifying and writing change logs programatically
Extended FileSystemRecursiveIterator to allow to customize, in which directories to recurse and in which not
Extended IMicroNode API to support removeChildAtIndex and removeAllChildren
